verbose_text: Because it was recently postulated that miRNAs can bind and activate endogenous TLRs such as TLR7 and TLR8 XREF_BIBR, and we had previously detected overexpression of TLR7 in a small cohort of MDS CD34 + patients XREF_BIBR, we determined to investigate if the regulation of this TLR is also altered in MDS and if it is connected with miR-125a / miR-99b expression.
